tasks.label: Fix Git LFS and Push
tasks.command: git lfs install && git rm --cached -r . && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push -u origin HEAD --force

tasks.label: Migrate to Git LFS and Push
tasks.command: git lfs migrate import --everything --include="*.gguf,libtorch_cpu.dylib,*.bin,*.dylib,*.so,*.zip,koboldcpp-mac-arm64,MaeumAI" && git push -u origin main --force

tasks.label: Remove Zip from Git History and Push
tasks.command: git rm --cached MAEUM_AI_TRUTHFUL_v1.0_macOS.zip && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push -u origin main --force

tasks.label: Push All Files to GitHub
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m "Upload MAEUM_AI_TRUTHFUL_v1.0_macOS files" && git push -u origin main

tasks.label: Ensure Remote and Push
tasks.command: git remote set-url origin https://github.com/LCO-L/MAEUM_AI_TRUTHFUL_v1.0.git || git remote add origin https://github.com/LCO-L/MAEUM_AI_TRUTHFUL_v1.0.git && git add . && git commit -m "Upload files to GitHub" && git push -u origin main
